backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing and validating contact form entries, with submit and query functions using trimmed fields and basic email checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, routes, components, and page content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that configures TanStack Router routes and attaches them to the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/BookFreeConsulta: CTA component offering WhatsApp, call, and contact form actions in default or compact layouts.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component with validation, success/error states, and backend submission via a React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the website footer with brand info, quick links, services list, and contact details, including fallback logic for logo errors.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with navigation links, logo handling, mobile menu, and consultation contact options.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, and routed content via an Outlet.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Exports a typed list of sample solar projects with details like location, capacity, images, and benefits.
frontend/src/data/serviceDetails.ts: Provides structured metadata and descriptions for various solar services, including features, benefits, and SEO fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Loads an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and context provisioning for identity-aware components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Adds a mutation hook for submitting contact form data through the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography utilities.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports brand constants including name, logo path, and tagline.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides functions to update document title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar system calculation logic, subsidy rules, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/solarKwImages.ts: Maps solar system size ranges to representative images with descriptions and provides a fallback image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, vision, mission, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Renders an interactive solar savings calculator with inputs, results, images, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, offices, and a consultation form, along with SEO initialization.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero content, service highlights, testimonials, and calls to action with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains how a grid‑connected solar system works with steps, infographic, benefits, and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows hero section, project stats, and a gallery of featured solar installations populated from project data.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Loads a service by slug and displays its details, features, benefits, and SEO metadata with a fallback for missing services.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all available solar services with icons and links to detailed pages, plus a consultation CTA and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/SubsidiesPage.tsx: Presents information on government solar subsidies with cards, tables, and a consultation CTA, including SEO settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and container settings while enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, required images, and features related to showing kW‑specific solar photos and handling user‑uploaded logos.
